item.title: Donator Zone Command?
item.dc:creator: @GfServerMaker1 GfServerMaker1
item.description:
@GfServerMaker1 wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:8, topic:550065”][quote author=GfServerMaker1 link=topic=668941.msg4473726#msg4473726 date=1424563557]
this is quite simple, this isn’t as clean code, but it still would work :

if (playerCommand.equals("chill") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2121, 4918, 0, "modern"); ///c.sendMessage("Welcome, chill and have fun.");

the object of this is you want a donator zone command, so you would change (“chill”) to whatever you would whatever you want the donator to type in to go to the donator zone. ( if you want donators only to go to this zone, the (c.playerRights >= 0)) { , the “0” would be changed to whatever the donator playerRight is. you’d also have to change the coordinates (2121, 4918) the 0 = height, shouldn’t need to be messed with unless needed. the ///c.sendMessage you can add, just don’t add the " /// " as that disables that part of the command.

if you have any questions, feel free to PM me
[/quote]

He already has the command mate… That is basically the exact same thing without the else statement.[/quote]yes i know this, but he says it doesn’t work, so i gave him a working one.

Read full topic

the object of this is you want a donator zone command, so you would change (“chill”) to whatever you would whatever you want the donator to type in to go to the donator zone. ( if you want donators only to go to this zone, the (c.playerRights >= 0)) { , the “0” would be changed to whatever the donator playerRight is. you’d also have to change the coordinates (2121, 4918) the 0 = height, shouldn’t need to be messed with unless needed. the ///c.sendMessage you can add, just don’t add the " /// " as that disables that part of the command.

if you have any questions, feel free to PM me[/quote]

item.title: Donator Zone Command?
item.dc:creator: @GfServerMaker1 GfServerMaker1
item.description:
@GfServerMaker1 wrote:

this is quite simple, this isn’t as clean code, but it still would work :

if (playerCommand.equals("chill") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2121, 4918, 0, "modern"); ///c.sendMessage("Welcome, chill and have fun.");

the object of this is you want a donator zone command, so you would change (“chill”) to whatever you would whatever you want the donator to type in to go to the donator zone. ( if you want donators only to go to this zone, the (c.playerRights >= 0)) { , the “0” would be changed to whatever the donator playerRight is. you’d also have to change the coordinates (2121, 4918) the 0 = height, shouldn’t need to be messed with unless needed. the ///c.sendMessage you can add, just don’t add the " /// " as that disables that part of the command.

if you have any questions, feel free to PM me

item.title: Donator Zone Command?
item.dc:creator: @Pest Pest
item.description:
@Pest wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:2, topic:550065”]if (command[0].equals("dzone")) { if (player.getDonator() == 0) { player.sendMessage("You must be a donator to teleport here."); } else if (player.getDonator() >= 1) { player.teleport(2659, 10091, 0); player.sendMessage("Welcome to Donator Zone"); } }

Change it to that. You need an else statement in there so that it can bypass the first part if the player is a donator.[/quote]
Still didn’t work man…

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Zone Command?
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

if (command[0].equals("dzone")) { if (player.getDonator() == 0) { player.sendMessage("You must be a donator to teleport here."); } else if (player.getDonator() >= 1) { player.teleport(2659, 10091, 0); player.sendMessage("Welcome to Donator Zone"); } }

Change it to that. You need an else statement in there so that it can bypass the first part if the player is a donator.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Zone Command?
item.dc:creator: @Pest Pest
item.description:
@Pest wrote:

I don’t get any errors compiling, but when i log on, and try to teleport, as a donator, it just sends the message, regardless. any help?if (command[0].equals("dzone")) { if (player.getDonator() == 0) { player.sendMessage("You must be a donator to teleport here."); } if (player.getDonator() >= 1) { player.teleport(2659, 10091, 0); player.sendMessage("Welcome to Donator Zone"); } }

Read full topic
